resources.string: Failed to unpair process of Bluetooth.

"Failed to connect %2$s(%1$s).
" "Is server in "Accept"ing status?
" "Multiple Bluetooth connection support depends on the device type. " "Is any other Bluetooth App working？
"
Failed to connect to %1$s, is Server \"Accept\"ing？
\"Accept\"(%1$s) failed, try to restart APP after Bluetooth Off/On on Android Settings.
Game will restart by successful reconnection.
Connection remains, ask disconnection to the server
Connected to \"%1$s\", but game can not be restarted because both side are not reconnection mode. Disconnect from reconnection mode side and \"Suspend/Gameover\" from \"Connection failure\" of Menu.

\"%1$s\" is reconnection mode(DuringGame status).\n Once disconnect from server by menu:\"Connection failure\", \"Reconnect\", \"Disconenct\". Then after \"Suspend/Gameover" if needed,\n reconnect to server after \"Gameover\" from menu.

Server is DuringGame status and \"%1$s\" is connection mode(status of start game).\n Ask to server to disconnect this client by menu:\"Connection failure\", \"Reconnect\", \"Disconnect\". Reconnect after menu:"Gameover" after "Suspend/Gameover".
No device found, is the device \"Discoverable\"?
\"Unpair\" from \"Settings" is required before \"Delete\" paired device.
This device is not \"Discoverable\",\n retry after pressing \"Discoverable\".
You could not change role of Server/Client. Disconnect all connection, the try new connection.
You are the Server, do you request to restart the following game?\n%1$s

You are a Client, do you request to restart the following game?
 Request will be sent to the server by "OK",
 ask to server to restart the game.

 %1$s
The record was sent from %1$s, do you save it？\n\n%2$s
The record was sent to the server.\n%1$s
Rule of the record was saved.\n%1$s
The record was sent to all client.
Member connected now is not all same as the record\'s one.
It is already exists, could not save to\ %1$s
Rule file used by the suspended game was not found,\ Ask to other member to send the record.\ The rule file is sent with the record file.\ %1$s
Resume request from server. Rulefile used in the suspended game is not found. Ask to server to \"Send\" the record of suspended game.
There is no Win agreed by all.
If there is valid Win, \"NextHand:Continue\" can not be selected.
If the \"Win\" is claimed as \"Error\" or \"Invalid\", \"NextHand:Continue\" is selectable.
Continue this hand with %1$s abandoned win.
set \"Pao\" responsible player other than winner and winning tile discarder.
\"Pao\" is askable only when a win exists.
\"TripleRon" is \"AbortiveDrawn\" by rule setting. \nProceed to \"AbortiveDrawn\" by \"OK\".
\"Suspend/Gameover\" is checked, Do you suspend this game?
For client:Connection error is not detected. Force to disconnect by \"OK\". Use \"OK\" only when the server detected connection error and the client dose not yet.

For server：Connection error is not detected. Reconnection dialog will be shown by \"OK\". Select and disconnect the client to be disconnected. Use \"OK\" only when the client detected connection error and the server dose not yet.

Received \"NG\" for \"Tobi Confirmation\". To proceed Gameover,\ 1. Press \"Cancel\" then press \"Send\" again to get \"OK\" by the new dialog popup.\ OR,\ 2. Press \"OK\", then press \"Fix\" to force Gameover.

Received \"NG\" for \"Final score\". To proceed Gameover,\ 1. Press \"Cancel\", then press \"Send\" again to get \"OK\" by the new dialog popup.\ OR,\ 2. Press \"OK\", then press \"Fix\" to force Gameover.

Received \"NG\" for \"On FinalHand\". To proceed the game,\ 1. Press \"Cancel\", then press \"Send\" again to get \"OK\" by the new dialog popup.\ OR,\ 2. Press \"OK\", then press \"Fix\" to force the decision.

Received \"NG\" for \"SuspendGame by ConnectionFailure\" or ConnectionFailure remains.\ To proceed SuspendGame,\ 1. In case of \"NG\", press \"Cancel\" then \"Send\" again to get \"OK\" by the new dialog popup. In case of ConnectionFailure remain \"Send\" after connection recovered.\ OR,\ 2. Press \"OK\", then press \"Fix\" to force SuspendGame. Do so if could not reconnect.

No connection to the server.\ To proceed SuspendGame,\ 1. Press \"Cancel\", then reconnect to the server which will proceed SuspendGame,\ OR,\ 2. Press \"OK\" if reconnection fails, then press \"Fix" to force SuspendGame.\

Received \"NG\" for \"SuspendGame Claim\". To proceed SuspendGame,\ 1. Press \"Cancel\", then press \"Send\" to get \"OK\" by the new dialog popup.\ OR,\ 2. Press \"OK\", then press \"Fix\" to force SuspenGame.
Received \"NG\" for \"Win Claim\",\ Ask to the winner to \"Send\" \"Win Claim\" again.\ Or \"Send\" with setting of \"Invalid\" or \"Error\".

Received \"NG\" for \"End-of-Hand\" call. To proceed game,\ 1. \"Cancel\" this and the dialog behind, then ask to the winner to \"Send\" again \"Win Claim\".\ OR,\ 2. Press \"Cancel\", then \"Send\" \"End-of-Hand\" again to get \"OK\" by the new dialog popup. Dealer can set the Win as \"Invalid\" or \"Chombo\" and can cotinue the hand with the player\'s Dead hand.\ OR,\ 3. Press \"OK\", then Press \"Fix\" to force End-of-Hand.

Received \"NG\" for the \"AbortiveDraw Claim\". To proceed the game,\ 1. Press \"Cancel" on this and the dialog behind, ask to the claimer to \"Send\" again "AbortiveDraw Claim".\ OR,\ 2. Press \"Cancel\", then \"Send\" again to get \"OK\" on the new dialog popup.\ OR,\ 3. Press \"OK\", then press \"Fix\" to force proceed AbortiveDraw.
Received \"NG\" for \"ResumeSuspended Confirmation\",\ You can ask again.
Declare Gameover by Tenpai(1 more tile)
(No means to rotate always for ExhaustiveDraw)

When AbortiveDraw is by \"Other\" or \"Chombo\" is set, \"Continue\" or \"Redeal\" is selectable. In that case \"Continue\" continue with the player\'s Dead hand (set \"Chombo\" penalty at end of the hand), \"Redeal\" sets penalty(Bankrupt may occur) and restart the hand with the same dealer, counter stick kept, Riichi stick backed.
\"Redeal\" is selectable when a \"Chombo\" is set. In that case set penalty to the player(may bankrupt), restart the hand with same dealer, counter stick kept, Riichi stick backed.
If \"Invalid\"(Without penalty) or \"Chombo\"(With penalty) is set, \"Continue\"(that player\' Dead hand) and \"Reset\" are selectable. Penalty is set at End-of-Hand.

When Chombo(Rule violation) occurred, on \"Claim Win\" dialog select option of \"Chombo\"(end the hand with paying panalty) , \"Invalid\"(continue the hand without paying penalty but as the player is dead). And \"Redeal\" is another option. Redeal means Chombo player pays penalty(Tobi may occur), restart with the same dealer and the same counterStick, RiichiBets returned. When Redeal is not selected, stay or rotate dealer is depends on winner is dealer or not. When no winner, rotate dealer if the dealer is Chombo player.
No penalty of Noten. 4Riichi and 4Kans completes when discard was not winning tile.
Check also stay dealer or not.
" = Fly away : Gameover when a plyer\'s score goes to negative."
" = Grilled chicken : The mark disappears by win and get off the penalty."
Out of score placing. Not imposed when robot included.
Could not declare Riichi if you have no tile to draw at near of the exhaustive draw, or Riichi deposit bankrupt you. Warning:Riichi accepted even if your hand is premature.

a Drawn: Pay Noten penalty, leave Riichi beds, no additional CounterStick, rotate dealer if dealer is Noten.\n a Win: No Noten penalty, remove Yakitori mark, apply Split rule, stay dealer if dealer win.\n In both case Multiple Ron setting is applied. HeadBump means nearest to East wind position. When Tobi occurred, Tobi prize player is determined by the paying point of NagashiMangan then Noten penalty each from nearest position to the dealer. Triple Ron rule is not applied.
fill Filename or select a item from list.
%1$s:read failed or not a rule file.
"Both Internal folder/SD card is not available."
Select only one file for Load/Save/Open.
Too large file, available max is %1%d.
\"Immediately\" means just after drawn Kan tile, witch only open KanDora for WinByKanTile.
Impose Chombo penalty fully, pay Tobi-Prize:
Noten penalty is imposed, \"Tobi-Prize\" is equally divided.
No means HeadBump. Applyed to TripleRon if it is not AbortiveDraw.
To assign temporary dealer, the player indicated by lamp touch the dice.
To assign seat position, the temporary dealer touch the dice at first.
To get seat position, all player touch the lamp lit sequentially to get wind tile.
To transfer position, temporary dealer touch the dice.
East round 1st rotation, The first dealer cast the dice.
Missing players, you can start game with robots if the rule allows.
Missing %1$d players. \nDo you start game including Robot?
Missing %1$d players. \nRule setting allows a game including Robot.
You could put Riich bets, the rule is \"Tobi\":Yes.
Can not Pon,Kan,Chii for last Discard.
Can not Riichi if you have no chance to Draw.
By the rule setting, Ankan after Riichi declared is not available.
By the rule setting, Ron of \"Kokushi\" for Ankan is not available.
By the rule, Open Riichi is not allowed.
Timeout after last Discard and Draw completed. Ron can not be claimed.
You can not discard for this type of AbortiveDraw.
Dialog was updated after \"Send\", You have to re-send.

Received \"NG\" for \"AbortiveDraw Confirmation\".\ To proceed game,\ 1. Press \"Cancel\", press \"Close\" on the dialog behind, then ask to the claimer to \"Send\" again \"AbortiveDraw Claim\".\ OR,\ 2. Press \"Cancel\", press \"Send\" again to get \"OK\" for new dialog popup.\ OR,\ 3. Press \"OK\", press \"Fix\" to proceed \"AbortiveDraw\"(stay or rotate dealer), \"Continue\" or \"Redeal\".
Do you cancel AbortiveDraw？\ \"OK\" will cancel AbortiveDraw then continue this hand.\ \"Cancel\" will return to \"AbortiveDraw Confirmation\".
Can not compose a winning hand.
Use \"Win\" button because setting of \"1 han-constraint\" checking is Off.
Multiple candidates for a Meld, touch the tile in hand to fix a Meld.
Multiple Meld candidates for Kan, touch the tile in hand to fix a Meld.
All winners have to claim Score.
Ask to winner to send again \"Win Claim"
Some Wins are not agreed. Ask to the winner to send \"Win Claim\" if he wants.
Ignored \"Game\" request, Already in during Gaming.
You can set \"Invalid\" for Win received \"NG\" only.
\"Tobi\" is not recorded, ask to dealer to send again if you want.
Rule file synchronization required for some device.
SuspendGame clam or cancel is available in during gaming.
Connection failure detected, Try MenuItem \"Connection failure\".
No connection failure detected.(Server can not disconnect)
\"Suspend\" confirmation dialog not yet opened, retry from \"End of a hand\" of menu.
Only server can open \"Suspend\" confirmation dialog.
No connection exists, do you proceed to Gameover?\n After pushing \"Cancel\", selecting \"Connection failure\" menu item, you can reconnect or suspend game.
No connection exists, do you want \"Reconnect\" or \"EndGame\"?
%1$s requested ResumeGame now showing. Ignored it is duplicated.
%1$s requested ResumeGame other than now showing.
Received ResumeGame confirmation response from %1$s for other than now showing.
Received ResumeGame confirmation response from %1$s for other than now showing. It is ignored because the record\'s Timestamp unmatch.
Do you make the game over with above scores or suspend the game?
Impose penalty on checked player by Settings

Option is default and changeable on dialog. Penalty is divided equally, no effect to placement. When Gameover, Yakitori penalty is not imposed. When Sespend by ConnectionErr, if \"Pao\" is checked ON in the dialog, penalty is minimum 8000*3 regardless of this setting.
Score contains returned Riichi bets. When making game over, ChickenPenalty is not counted.
Not in last hand of last round.
After Discard, Chii/Draw is available after Pon/Kan time exhausted.
After Ankan/Chankan, Rinshan Take is available after Ron time exhausted.
After Discard, Pon/Kan is available after Ron time exhausted.
You can not claim \"Wait!\" for your discarded.
You can claim Discard of other player and your draw.
You can not claim \"Wait!\" for your draw because AutoDiscardTime is not set.
You can not claim \"Wait!\" during you are drawn.
Blocked status by other player\'s call for discard.
Blocked status by other player\'s calling discard.
Other player is selecting Melds for the discard.(with timeout rule)
Other player is selecting Melds for thje discard.(Witout timeout rule)
Select tile for a Melds then push orange button.
Blocked will be released when other player cancel the call.
Other player also called Ron with rule of Multiple Ron allowed.
Other player also called Ron with rule of HeadBump for multiple Ron.
Other player declared Ron and now your turn with rule of multiple Ron allowed.
Other player declared Ron and now your turn with rule of HeadBunp for multiple Ron.
Late Ron. It will be accepted only when other player canceled the claim of Ron.
Other player canceled its call, now your turn.
Your call was canceled by activation of other player\'s call leading.
AutoDraw and AutoDiscard will be blocked until AbortiveDraw is fixed.
Now not your turn, the call was ignored.
Block of AutoDraw and AutoDiscard was released.
A player canceled claim of AbortiveDraw, yet other player is claiming. PLS wait.
All claim of AbortiveDraw was canceled. Block of AutoDraw/AutoDiscard was released.
All claim of AbortiveDraw was canceled.
Setting is Robot do not get Tobi.
Before dealing tiles. Use \"Back\" button to return.
Game not yet started, do you stop the game?
Only server can send again after agreement by all gotten.
Rule file was changed after agreement received. Server(%1$s) send it again.
The rule is not agreed, Server(%1$s) send rule file.
Client (%1$S) changed rule. Getting Agreement required anew.
This device is server, send the rule because it is updated.
Rule is not established yet. Press \"Settings\".
Rule was synchronized, game will start.
Rule is synchronized with %1$d players, no send required.
Now your turn by canceled blocking call.
Ron (Red):Semicircle lamp becomes red just after discard. Pon/Kan is available after this time exhausted.
Pon/Kan (Yellow):Semicircle lamp becomes green after Ron+Pon/Kan time exhausted, then Chii/Draw is available.
After last discard: ExhaustiveDraw completes when this time exhausted after lamp changed to green.
AutoDiscard:Lamp becomes blue just after draw, then the tile of green frame will be discarded when this time exhausted. 0 means no timeout.
AutoDraw:Next player draws automatically when this time exhausted from start of Chii/Draw period. 0 means no timeout. Applied for also KanDraw.
AutoDraw for Robot:Set minimum 1 second. This is applied if Autodraw above is 0, else the value above is applied.
（skip action to draw tile from set of 東南西北)
\"JAW\"、\"CancW\" button appears, \"Wait!\" is functional.\ Depending \"Timeout\" setting, action can not be blocked may exist.

\"Win call is cancelable\" : Enters into \"Wait!\" status by \"Win\" button and blockes other player\'s action and AutoDraw. The block will be released by \"Win\" or \"Cancel\" was pressed or timeout expired.\ Blocking will also occur by Pon/Chii call with multiple Melds candidate. After selecting tile to fix the Melds, press Pon/Chii again.\ See also Help.
You can correct it on Dialog.
Down if plus, Up if minus.
Up means toward zero for minus. Zero-sum adjustment is done by top place player\'point.
Out of %1$d, Agreed: %2$d, Disagree: %3$d, Not Responded: %4$d
Received from %1$s but send again by rule updated.
Server(%1$s) dis not get agree from all players.
Remove the tile called from Discard Pile.
You can select BGM while playing game.
Allow to include robot(Just discard then drawn) when lacking player.
Dealer may claim Gameover by Tenpai if stay dealer by Tenpai.
Dealer may claim Gameover by win.
Not top place dealer may claim.
If dealer have to be rotate
If all players\'s point are negative when rotating dealer
Gameover is declarable even if all players point is negative. RiichBets is returned if drawn hand. Extra round is 西-北-東 for 東南 game, repeated 東-北 for 東北 game.

Consecutive counter is shown around the dice. Completion is confirmed by it or counterStick. \"Combinable\" allow multiple Yakuman if the win itself has worth of Yakuman. If \"Reset counter\" is On, next is (16th hand)/(16 CounterStick). If Off, chance of this Yakuman continues.

Finally:Accept winning hand if it has Yaku finally. Middle:Allow also not first calling a tile as first call. First only:Required first calling a tile is related a Yaku of winning hand OR tiles in hand has Yaku or fixed by not multiple tile wait at Ron.\n Muti tile wait Ron:For Finally only, accept multiple tile wait if winning tile has Yaku. Be careful of temporary furiten.\n Muti tile wait Draw OK:For Middle and First only, accpt multiple tile wait if winning tile drawn has Yaku.
(If off, can make 0 han err Ron.)
Allows that Yaku is composed finally
Kansaki rule allows Riichi and SelfDraw, but disallows Riichi and Win before next discard or Riichi and last tile drawn/discarded because those are Yaku by unexpected event.
This is note of rule, which is not checked by this App.

This is basically note of rule, items with dark green are checked by this App.
Items with yellowish brown are checked if Setting option of \"Evaluate Point by APP\" is on.
13 or more han(Max Mangan*3 if off）
Accept AbotedDraw by 5th Kan for a player\'s Tenpai of 4 Kans. Select Draw on Menu.
5th Kan. Setting to protect Yakuman:4Kan is %1$s.
Accept Ron for Ankan by Kokushi.

14 broken is by the status of at first Take.\nAdditional to this and Double Youman,4 Kans with pair, Big 3 dragons, All honors, Litte 4 wind, All terminals, Heavenly hans, Hand of earth. Some are composable to Double Yakuman like as Big 3 dragons and All honors.
Specify rank. Composable means adding han of other Yaku to the han of the rank(Manga:4 han)\n Not composable means get higher of normal point and this setting.
Dealer\'s win at final hand, you can declare Gameover.
Dealer\'s win at final hand, dealer is considering Gameover.
Dealer declared Gameover by win at final hand.
Dealer declared to continue game regardles win at final hand.
Dealer\'s Tenpai at final hand, you can declare Gameover
Dealer declared Gameover by Tenpai at final hand.
Dealer declared to continue game regardless Tenpai at final hand.
Final hand, stay dealer by rule setting of \"AbortiveDraw:stay dealer\".
Final hand, enter to next round by rule setting \"AbortiveDraw:rotate dealer\".
Final hand, Gameover by rule setting \"AbortiveDraw:rotate dealer\".
Final hand, enter to extra round by all players point are minus.
Final hand, extra to next round by rotating dealer.
Final hand, Gameover by non-dealer\'s win.
Final hand, Gameover by dealer\'s Noten.
Uunderneath Kan-Dora is set to No by No underneath-Dora or No Kan-Dora.
Final hand, Gameover by declaration by dealer\'s win
Final hand, Gameover by declaration of dealer\'s Tenpai.

Tanyao, Pinfu, 1 identical sequence, Last tile, Win by KanDraw, Double-Riichi,Robbing a Kan
 All triplet, 3 color straight, Straight, Terminal and honor, 3 closed triplet, Little 3 dragons, All terminals and honors, 3 color triplet,3 Kans
 half flush, Terminal in each set, 2 identical sequences
 Flush
See also topic of Yakuman, Hand of man, NagasiMangan. Otherwise, take agree in the group beforehand.
" = SpritPos : You will see \"割\" in End-of-Hand dialog."
" (Player of wall broken position at start of a hand pays double.)"
Chombo, Noten penalty, CounterStick is not covered, Nagasimangan is covered if it is one of win by rule setting.\n In case of Pao, Sprit applied after Pao penalty applied.
"Wireless mode can not be mixed.\n" "Current mode is %1$s."
Permission of \"Access to location\" is required to use WifiDirect.
No permission to \"Write to SD\", Internal data folder will be used which is cleared at reinstallation.
Pemission of \"wrie to SD\" is allowed.
Retry after once disconnect remaining Bluetooth connection.
On serve, \"Unpair\" dose unpair all. \nDo you proceed \"Uppair\"?
\"Unpair\" disconnects remaining connection. Do you proceed \"Unpair\"?
No paired device found. do \"Discover\". See also Help.
This is client side, do \"Connect\" after confirmation of server entered to \"Accept\" status.
This is server side,\nwait connection request from client after pressing \"Accept\".
Found, do \"Pair\" for \"vailable\" device. See also Help.
This device is server side(Connection Acceptor)
This device is client side(Connection requester).
Failed to get IP address of this device.\nConfirm status of Wifi on Android\'Settings after closing this dialog.
Error! Channel was lost.\nRetry after enabling WiFi Direct(See Help).
"\"WiFi Direct\" is not available. Enable it from \"Settings\"(See \"Help\")\n"
It is not supported for this device.
Wireless mode could not be mixed. To use Wifi direct, disconnect remaining Bluetooth connection all.
Wireless mode could not be mixed. To use Bluetooth, disconnect remaining Wifi direct connection all.
Setting of \"Evaluation by App\" is Off. Select \"Fu\" and \"han\".
Violation of Same-Meld, select the other Tile.
Use not \"Win\" but \"Win anyway" to proceed Win.
